name: Shadow Archer (itch)
description:
Take up the Crossbow! The village is under attack, can you eliminate all the invaders without being caught?

WHAT'S THIS!?

Shadow Archer is a VR Experience where you take on the role of the Huntsman. Developed for the Oculus Quest, this game will have you maneuver though your village on the hunt for all the intruders.

DON'T GET CAUGHT!

Pay attention to your surroundings and take on the army of Warriors, Ninjas and Captains accross several levels. Use your wits and make use of the environment to create distractions. Teleport between marked locations to avoid detection and hunt down all the intruders.

*Requirements:* Please note, this game was developed for the Oculus Quest, and as such requires the headset in order to be played. As this has not been officially published on the Oculus Store  some additional steps may be required in order to install and play. 

Project Status!

The build available for download has been produced as part of an assessed piece of content for a University Degree and as such is a self contained VR experience that I decided to share.
This project was developed as part of a two person team, with development handled by myself and design headed by Jian Wu.

Got feedback for the Dev? Feel free to contact me via Twitter @Katacaz.
